original_text: In this paper, a regression analysis based method is proposed to calculate the Journal Influence Score. This Influence Score is used to measure the scientific influence of scholarly journals. Journal Influence Score is calculated by using various factors in a weighted manner. The Score is then compared with the SCImago Journal Score. The results show that the error is small between the existing and proposed methods, proving that the model is a feasible and effective way of calculating scientific impact of journals.
original_translation: En este documento, se propone un método basado en análisis de regresión para calcular el Puntaje de Influencia de la Revista. Este Puntaje de Influencia se utiliza para medir la influencia científica de revistas académicas. La puntuación de influencia de una revista se calcula utilizando varios factores de manera ponderada. La puntuación se compara luego con la Puntuación de Revistas SCImago. Los resultados muestran que el error es pequeño entre los métodos existentes y propuestos, demostrando que el modelo es una forma factible y efectiva de calcular el impacto científico de las revistas.
original_sentences: In this paper, a regression analysis based method is proposed to calculate the Journal Influence Score.

Journal Influence Score is calculated by using various factors in a weighted manner.
The Score is then compared with the SCImago Journal Score.
The results show that the error is small between the existing and proposed methods, proving that the model is a feasible and effective way of calculating scientific impact of journals.
